name: py-wandb

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pathtools
dependencies.description: Path utilities for Python

dependencies.name: py-setproctitle
dependencies.description:
The setproctitle module allows a process to change its title (as
displayed by system tools such as ps and top).

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".

dependencies.name: py-protobuf
dependencies.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral,
extensible mechanism for serializing structured data - think XML, but
smaller, faster, and simpler. You define how you want your data to be
structured once, then you can use special generated source code to
easily write and read your structured data to and from a variety of data
streams and using a variety of languages.

dependencies.name: py-dataclasses
dependencies.description: A backport of the dataclasses module for Python 3.6

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-gql
dependencies.description:
This is a GraphQL client for Python. Plays nicely with graphene,
graphql-core, graphql-js and any other GraphQL implementation compatible
with the spec. GQL architecture is inspired by React-Relay and Apollo-
Client.

dependencies.name: py-nvidia-ml-py3
dependencies.description: Python Bindings for the NVIDIA Management Library.

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-shortuuid
dependencies.description: A generator library for concise, unambiguous and URL-safe UUIDs.

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-watchdog
dependencies.description: Python library and shell utilities to monitor filesystem events.

dependencies.name: py-configparser
dependencies.description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-gitpython
dependencies.description: GitPython is a python library used to interact with Git repositories.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependencies.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependencies.name: py-dockerpy-creds
dependencies.description: Python bindings for the docker credentials store API

dependent_to.name: mlperf-deepcam
dependent_to.description:
PyTorch implementation for the climate segmentation benchmark, based on
the Exascale Deep Learning for Climate Analytics

dependent_to.name: py-ocp-models
dependent_to.description:
Reference implementation for the MLPerf HPC OpenCatalyst DimeNet++
benchmark
